con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="http://ipwhois.app"/> <resources base="http://ipwhois.app"> <resource path="json/{IP}" id="IP"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="IP"/> <method name="GET" id="IP"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="IP"/> <request> <param default="IP" name="IP" type="xs:string" required="true" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=utf-8"/> </response> </method> <method name="GET" id="IP 2"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="IP 2"/> <request> <param default="IP" name="IP" type="xs:string" required="true" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json; charset=utf-8"/> </response> </method> <method name="GET" id="IP 3"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="IP 3"/> <request> <param default="IP" name="IP" type="xs:string" required="true" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> </method> </resource> </resources> </application>

<application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="https://petstore.swagger.io"/> <resources base="https://petstore.swagger.io"> <resource path="v2/pet" id="Post_Request"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Post_Request"/> <method name="POST" id="Pet"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Pet"/> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="v2/pet/findByStatus" id="Get_Request"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Get_Request"/> <method name="GET" id="FindByStatus"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="FindByStatus"/> <request> <param default="sold" name="status" type="xs:string" required="true" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="GET" id="Get_Request"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Get_Request"/> <request> <param default="sold" name="status" type="xs:string" required="true" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="v2/pet/{petId}" id="Delete_Request"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Delete_Request"/> <method name="DELETE" id="PetId"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="PetId"/> <request> <param default="petId" name="petId" type="xs:string" required="true" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType=""/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="v2/user" id="User"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="User"/> <method name="POST" id="User"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="User"/> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="v2/user/login" id="Login"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Login"/> <method name="GET" id="Login"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Login"/> <request> <param default="{username}" name="username" type="xs:string" required="true" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <param default="{password}" name="password" type="xs:string" required="true" style="query" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="v2/user/{username}" id="Username"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Username"/> <method name="GET" id="Username"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Username"/> <request> <param default="username" name="username" type="xs:string" required="true" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </request> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="DELETE" id="Username 2"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Username 2"/> <request> <param default="username" name="username" type="xs:string" required="true" style="template" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="404"> <representation mediaType=""/> </response> <response status=""> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="v2/user/logout" id="Logout"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Logout"/> <method name="GET" id="Logout"> <doc xml:lang="en" title="Logout"/> <request/> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resources> </application>
